messages.pass: Elements with the name "${data.name}" have both a shared label, and a unique label, referenced through aria-labelledby

fail.default: Elements with the name "${data.name}" do not all have both a shared label, and a unique label referenced through aria-labelledby
fail.no-shared-label: Elements with the name "${data.name}" do not all have a shared label referenced through aria-labelledby
fail.no-unique-label: Elements with the name "${data.name}" do not all have a unique label referenced through aria-labelledby
